MarkdownCodeBlock.code_block:
## Reconfigure the topology "mytopology" to use 5 worker processes, ## the spout "blue-spout" to use 3 executors, and ## the bolt "yellow-bolt" to use 10 executors
$ storm rebalance mytopology -n 5 -e blue-spout=3 -e yellow-bolt=10

ImageItem.internal_link_text: hdinsight hadoop hbase storm spark scale
hdinsight hadoop hbase storm spark scale
hdinsight enable disable configure remote desktop
hdinsight enable disable configure remote desktop
